title: flecsi failing to build
body:
Trying to build `flecsi` on the following `x86_64` systems is failing with `gcc@7.4.0` and `gcc@7.3.0`:
1. CentOS 7
2. CentOS 8
3. RHEL 7
4. RHEL 8
5. Ubuntu 18.04

Using branch develop @ commit 471f23e45 (~14-March-2020)

```
$> spack install flecsi
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-flecsi-master-ysdpkplojwzsut6pokmmvrvhbyncvxro/spack-src' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/flecsi-master-ysdpkplojwzsut6pokmmvrvhbyncvxro' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=FALSE' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/flecsi-master-ysdpkplojwzsut6pokmmvrvhbyncvxro/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/flecsi-master-ysdpkplojwzsut6pokmmvrvhbyncvxro/lib64;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/boost-1.72.0-m3pcmmu3kwe5egltjqy5vu7yccknycep/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/bzip2-1.0.8-g2ghsbb6kih2itnkcqc2v6iraimj23r4/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/mpich-3.2.1-om2ebndbpaksaykav76dtc6xoqcyekqr/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libpciaccess-0.13.5-vhehc322oo5ipbbk465m6py6zzr4kdam/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libxml2-2.9.9-fg5evg4bxx4jy3paclojb46lok4fjclf/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libiconv-1.16-zvmmgjbnfrzbo3hl2ijqxcjpkiv7q3ab/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/xz-5.2.4-ur2jffeua3gzg5otnmqgfnfdexgtjxcl/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/zlib-1.2.11-o2viq7yriiaw6nwqpaa7ltpyzqkaonhb/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/metis-5.1.0-q6wvktue4oy654iuyspzahnj7xbgjjry/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/parmetis-4.0.3-7qd3q2kc5hgv4ovw26e7fqzcchf5gmrt/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/cmake-3.16.2-tjojk4ypphyos7thyqpptryki43m4sta;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/mpich-3.2.1-om2ebndbpaksaykav76dtc6xoqcyekqr;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/boost-1.72.0-m3pcmmu3kwe5egltjqy5vu7yccknycep;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/metis-5.1.0-q6wvktue4oy654iuyspzahnj7xbgjjry;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/parmetis-4.0.3-7qd3q2kc5hgv4ovw26e7fqzcchf5gmrt' '-DENABLE_OPENMP=ON' '-DCXX_CONFORMANCE_STANDARD=c++17' '-DENABLE_METIS=ON' '-DENABLE_PARMETIS=ON' '-DENABLE_COLORING=ON' '-DENABLE_DEVEL_TARGETS=ON' '-DFLECSI_RUNTIME_MODEL=mpi' '-DENABLE_MPI=ON' '-DENABLE_UNIT_TESTS=OFF' '-DCMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_METIS=OFF' '-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON' '-DENABLE_HDF5=OFF' '-DENABLE_CALIPER=OFF' '-DENABLE_FLECSIT=OFF' '-DENABLE_FLECSI_TUTORIAL=OFF' '-DENABLE_FLECSTAN=OFF' '-DENABLE_DOXYGEN=OFF' '-DENABLE_DOCUMENTATION=OFF' '-DENABLE_COVERAGE_BUILD=OFF'

1 error found in build log:
     24    -- Check for working CXX compiler: /home/walker/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++
     25    -- Check for working CXX compiler: /home/walker/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -- works
     26    -- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info
     27    -- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info - done
     28    -- Detecting CXX compile features
     29    -- Detecting CXX compile features - done
  >> 30    CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:41 (include):
     31      include could not find load file:
     32
     33        /tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-flecsi-master-ysdpkplojwzsut6pokmmvrvhbyncvxro/spack-src/cinch/cmake/ProjectLists.txt
     34
     35
     36    -- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
```

Full build log for `flecsi`: [flecsi-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4335545/flecsi-build-out.txt)

Trying to install with `+cinch` and `+caliper`:
```
$> spack install flecsi+cinch+caliper
...
==> Error: Failed to install flecsi due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-flecsi-master-xziervymfhsrtnqbuhxmspdhg2otmocq/spack-src' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/flecsi-master-xziervymfhsrtnqbuhxmspdhg2otmocq' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=FALSE' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/flecsi-master-xziervymfhsrtnqbuhxmspdhg2otmocq/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/flecsi-master-xziervymfhsrtnqbuhxmspdhg2otmocq/lib64;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/boost-1.72.0-m3pcmmu3kwe5egltjqy5vu7yccknycep/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/bzip2-1.0.8-g2ghsbb6kih2itnkcqc2v6iraimj23r4/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/mpich-3.2.1-om2ebndbpaksaykav76dtc6xoqcyekqr/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libpciaccess-0.13.5-vhehc322oo5ipbbk465m6py6zzr4kdam/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libxml2-2.9.9-fg5evg4bxx4jy3paclojb46lok4fjclf/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libiconv-1.16-zvmmgjbnfrzbo3hl2ijqxcjpkiv7q3ab/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/xz-5.2.4-ur2jffeua3gzg5otnmqgfnfdexgtjxcl/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/zlib-1.2.11-o2viq7yriiaw6nwqpaa7ltpyzqkaonhb/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/caliper-2.3.0-u3nagw7jw7x5myk4gpmy6hyzzjvdfsrr/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/adiak-0.1.1-nrntvrald23a6ypvfwisoviayz2wfeif/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/gotcha-1.0.2-po3xljpzmrgnvczmudwlsaafplphyndj/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libpfm4-4.10.1-a3xl5maiq3uhpdvowe5cedh63pw2ytya/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/libunwind-1.3.1-jeqssjymbfkqfxfq5npxqpgzopwr5vjx/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/papi-5.7.0-ssx7luxxxfrklnsuf6lqfcql7wlu2hhi/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/metis-5.1.0-q6wvktue4oy654iuyspzahnj7xbgjjry/lib;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/parmetis-4.0.3-7qd3q2kc5hgv4ovw26e7fqzcchf5gmrt/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/cmake-3.16.2-tjojk4ypphyos7thyqpptryki43m4sta;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/cinch-develop-w5ahsfk2t4kcat5rsmpt2jj3ds4rh2vp;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/mpich-3.2.1-om2ebndbpaksaykav76dtc6xoqcyekqr;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/boost-1.72.0-m3pcmmu3kwe5egltjqy5vu7yccknycep;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/metis-5.1.0-q6wvktue4oy654iuyspzahnj7xbgjjry;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/parmetis-4.0.3-7qd3q2kc5hgv4ovw26e7fqzcchf5gmrt;/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/caliper-2.3.0-u3nagw7jw7x5myk4gpmy6hyzzjvdfsrr' '-DENABLE_OPENMP=ON' '-DCXX_CONFORMANCE_STANDARD=c++17' '-DENABLE_METIS=ON' '-DENABLE_PARMETIS=ON' '-DENABLE_COLORING=ON' '-DENABLE_DEVEL_TARGETS=ON' '-DCINCH_SOURCE_DIR=/home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/cinch-develop-w5ahsfk2t4kcat5rsmpt2jj3ds4rh2vp' '-DFLECSI_RUNTIME_MODEL=mpi' '-DENABLE_MPI=ON' '-DENABLE_UNIT_TESTS=OFF' '-DCMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_METIS=OFF' '-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON' '-DENABLE_HDF5=OFF' '-DENABLE_CALIPER=ON' '-DENABLE_FLECSIT=OFF' '-DENABLE_FLECSI_TUTORIAL=OFF' '-DENABLE_FLECSTAN=OFF' '-DENABLE_DOXYGEN=OFF' '-DENABLE_DOCUMENTATION=OFF' '-DENABLE_COVERAGE_BUILD=OFF'

1 error found in build log:
     40    -- Found PkgConfig: /usr/bin/pkg-config (found version "0.29.1")
     41    -- Checking for module 'caliper'
     42    --   Found caliper, version 2.3.0
     43    -- Found Caliper: /home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/caliper-2.3.0-u3nagw7jw7x5myk4gpmy6hyzzjvdfsrr/li
           b/libcaliper-mpi.so
     44    -- Found Caliper: /home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/caliper-2.3.0-u3nagw7jw7x5myk4gpmy6hyzzjvdfsrr/in
           clude
     45    -- Found Caliper: /home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/caliper-2.3.0-u3nagw7jw7x5myk4gpmy6hyzzjvdfsrr/in
           clude
  >> 46    CMake Error at config/project.cmake:379 (message):
     47      MPI is required for the mpi runtime model
     48    Call Stack (most recent call first):
     49      /home/walker/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.4.0/cinch-develop-w5ahsfk2t4kcat5rsmpt2jj3ds4rh2vp/cmake/ProjectLists
           .txt:45 (include)
     50      CMakeLists.txt:41 (include)
```

Full build log for `flecsi+cinch+caliper` : [flecsi-cinch-caliper-build.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4335559/flecsi-cinch-caliper-build.txt)



@ktsai7 @junghans @JulienLoiseau
